content: a fun and easy pattern for beginner and advanced crocheters alike its small size makes this the purr-fect car or travel project especially if you re visiting friends with a cat this pattern is available for free on our yarning blog or if you prefer to work with printed patterns this easy-to-follow instant download with have you starting this fun project within minutes pattern includes all directions and photos you see on our blog post 14 pages if printed from the blog in a handy 2 page pdf ready to travel or read without a screen or wasting ink and paper skill level easy with basic knowledge of crochet techniques size small 18 x 24 46 cm x 60cm medium +10 st large +20 st repeat 5 pattern repeat increase as desired in multiples of 5 gauge not necessary relax cats don t care you will need for blanket yarn 10 oz +/- 4 ply worsted yarn in 3 colors crochet hooks i/9 5 5mm blanket 7 4 5 mm border tapestry needle for catnip mouse yarn 4 ply worsted yarn crochet hook c/2 2 5mm tail 8 203mm cord rawhide or yarn polyfil small quantity for body catnip 2-3 tablespoons of good stuff detail black and pink embroidery floss or yarn for eyes and nose
